tool_description: An API showing all the latest reviews of diffirent forms of entertainment from the largest entertainment maagazines websites.
name: Entertainment Review Live
title: Entertainment Review Live

api_list.name: Get Individual Entertainment Reviews
api_list.description: Gets Reviews from specific Entertainment magazines/websites.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://entertainment-review-live.p.rapidapi.com/reviews/IGN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entertainment-review-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://entertainment-review-live.p.rapidapi.com/reviews/{entertainmentmagazineid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entertainment-review-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Entertainment Reviews
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the latest entertainment reviews.
